DOC.detailed_description: This study multicenter , non-blinded , non-comparative study . Patients meet eligible criterion undergo one week observation period follow four week treatment period . In treatment period , patient receive gabapentin enacarbil orally one daily dinner . After four-week treatment period gabapentin enacarbil , one-week post-observation period undertaken .
